title: How to Make Oreo Graham

steps.headline: Add the cream to a mixing bowl.
steps.description: Add a little sugar, then mix it in. Do a taste test to check whether it is sweet enough for your liking. If not, add a little more; if yes, you're good to move to the next step.

steps.headline: Place the Oreo cookies in the other mixing bowl.
steps.description: Using the tip of the rolling pin, crush that Oreo cookies. When these are just crumbs, stir together to combine all of the pieces evenly.

steps.headline: Put the Oreo mixture into the freezer.
steps.description: Let it chill for 20 to 30 minutes.

steps.headline: Repeat for the graham crackers.
steps.description: Crush, stir, then freeze these in another bowl.

steps.headline: Take both mixtures out of the freezer, then mix them again, in their respective bowls.
Place a baking bowl or a square dish on the workspace.
steps.description: The bowl or dish must be freezer-proof.

steps.headline: Begin arranging the ingredients as follows:
steps.description:
One layer of crushed Oreo cookies{"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/b/bd/Make-Oreo-Graham-Step-7Bullet1.jpg/v4-460px-Make-Oreo-Graham-Step-7Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/b/bd/Make-Oreo-Graham-Step-7Bullet1.jpg/v4-760px-Make-Oreo-Graham-Step-7Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

"} Repeat until the ingredients are used up. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/f/f5/Make-Oreo-Graham-Step-7Bullet5.jpg/v4-460px-Make-Oreo-Graham-Step-7Bullet5.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/f/f5/Make-Oreo-Graham-Step-7Bullet5.jpg/v4-760px-Make-Oreo-Graham-Step-7Bullet5.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Fair Use (screenshot)

"}

steps.headline: Place the filled bowl or dish in the freezer.
steps.description: Allow to freeze for 1 hour and 30 minutes.

steps.headline: Remove the Oreo graham snack from the freezer.
steps.description: Unmold it from the bowl onto a serving plate.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: To serve, slice pieces of the snack and place onto small serving plates. There will be crumbs, so having it on a plate is a good idea. Serve immediately.

tyn: Freezer-proof bowl or dish for final assembly of the Oreo graham snack
Serving plate, wide enough for the unmolded snack
text:
Add the cream to a mixing bowl. Add a little sugar, then mix it in. Do a taste test to check whether it is sweet enough for your liking. If not, add a little more; if yes, you're good to move to the next step. Place the Oreo cookies in the other mixing bowl. Using the tip of the rolling pin, crush that Oreo cookies. When these are just crumbs, stir together to combine all of the pieces evenly. Put the Oreo mixture into the freezer. Let it chill for 20 to 30 minutes. Repeat for the graham crackers. Crush, stir, then freeze these in another bowl. Take both mixtures out of the freezer, then mix them again, in their respective bowls. Place a baking bowl or a square dish on the workspace. The bowl or dish must be freezer-proof. "} Repeat until the ingredients are used up. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/f/f5/Make-Oreo-Graham-Step-7Bullet5.jpg/v4-460px-Make-Oreo-Graham-Step-7Bullet5.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/f/f5/Make-Oreo-Graham-Step-7Bullet5.jpg/v4-760px-Make-Oreo-Graham-Step-7Bullet5.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

"} Place the filled bowl or dish in the freezer. Allow to freeze for 1 hour and 30 minutes. Remove the Oreo graham snack from the freezer. Unmold it from the bowl onto a serving plate. Serve. To serve, slice pieces of the snack and place onto small serving plates. There will be crumbs, so having it on a plate is a good idea. Serve immediately.
sentences: Add the cream to a mixing bowl.
Add a little sugar, then mix it in.
Do a taste test to check whether it is sweet enough for your liking.
If not, add a little more; if yes, you're good to move to the next step.
Place the Oreo cookies in the other mixing bowl.
Using the tip of the rolling pin, crush that Oreo cookies.
When these are just crumbs, stir together to combine all of the pieces evenly.
Put the Oreo mixture into the freezer.
Let it chill for 20 to 30 minutes.
Repeat for the graham crackers.
Crush, stir, then freeze these in another bowl.
Take both mixtures out of the freezer, then mix them again, in their respective bowls.
Place a baking bowl or a square dish on the workspace.
The bowl or dish must be freezer-proof.
